node.title: Pt 2-The Holy Spirit and the Cross
node.description: "We have seen the Holy Spirit's eager anticipation to participate in the creation of the world and the incarnation of Jesus.  Now we turn our eyes to the Spirit and Cross.  John the Baptist sought to help his hearers see the clear future of Jesus and also highlight a key component of His earthly ministry.  The same Lamb that takes away sins, also baptizes with the Holy Spirit.  The same way that John baptized with water. But which one comes first?"
